name: XAGOBAH
description:
This is version 2 of the first level of Xagobah, a game I have been developing as homework for my Game Programming class. It is built in Unity and uses Unity2D tile map and animator to do most of the level design/fun stuff. 

I had a great time making it and adding in sounds sourced from opengameart.org

Let me know what you think! Feedback is always welcome.
